body: @ゆりゆり Dude, could you be ANYMORE FUCKING dramatic? Married couples argue and tease each other ALL the time, it's not like she was being abused or anything 🙄 in fact from what I saw SHE was doing the abusing. Try looking at it ALOT more carefully next time.

This is the best outcome for the wife. Her son and husband kept on treating her like a joke. She's human, too. She has feelings and worries. And yet the glasses kid was the only one who showed her due respect/love. I mean, it's not everyday someone is dedicated enough to know your past career history, esp since in Mexican/Asian wrestling, all the people side with the hero and jeer the villain. And looks like she was villain wrestling char, so not much fandom for her old persona. She really should upgrade by ditching her husband. I mean the gorilla comment. Was that fucking necessary??? You MARRIED the "gorilla" ffs! And yet you think you can just simply get away with that? We need more NTRs like this. Seriously. So many girls are unappreciated and unloved, it's an utter crime. Esp when this wife was doing all she can to make sure her son gets a secured bright future while her husband doesn't seem to give a shit at all, whether it's their son's future or her needs. Asshole.
That Nerd boy, especially on page 5, looks like the Mr. Porn Geek from the said website...
This is the first "ugly bastard" NTR (does it even count when the UB is a kid?) I've ever tolerated reading all the way through.
